name: Ascend The Magisterium!
description:
//  XXX ASCEND THE MAGISTERIUM XXX

//  an arcane horror arithmetic micro-game
//  Made for the GameDev.tv Triple-X coursework project
//  to be accompanied by Sleep - Marijuanaut's Theme, or similar

//  @alfredmakes - 28/05/2020

I had a lot of fun making this over an evening. I definitely recommend the GameDev.tv courses on udemy (like this one) - they encourage you to have fun with coursework & share it, which sets it apart from doing youtube tutorials and such.

You can also check it out in your browser!
